mods.abstract: This folder contains 11 letters from Hermann Moyse to his parents, Simon and Flora Moyse, and to Rosalie Gottlieb, written while he was in a small town in France (1 letter), in Baton Rouge (La.), and at Citizens Training Camp at Fort Logan H. Roots in Arkansas (9 letters).
mods.note: Louisiana State University Libraries, Special Collections ( http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special )

titleInfo.title: Moyse-Gottlieb-Sommer Family Papers, Mss. 4671, Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Collections, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, La.
Hermann Moyse, Sr. World War I Collection

mods.accessCondition: E-mail lsudiglib@lsu.edu with questions or comments. See instructions for ordering reprints of this item here: http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special/services/duplication.html

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
